name: PeopleSoft: All new Translate value shoud be at dd/mm/yyyy
description: Identify each added Translate value with an effective date not equal to the parameter value
output: Failed checks gives the number of fields that contain new XLAT wrongly defined. The XLAT name can be found in the value column
rationale: To ensure that added Translate values are used in place of the standard value, choose an effective date greater than 01/01/1900.
total: Number of PeopleSoft Field translate values (MODIFIED)
